title: Ghana Progressive Hotels Association raises alarm over high utility tariffs
desc: The Ghana Progressive Hotels Association (GHAPROHA) has expressed serious concerns over the high cost of utility services, saying the situation is negatively affecting the operations and sustainability of hotels across the country.

title: Strengthen governance or risk another financial crisis
desc: Bank boards have been cautioned to rethink their role in safeguarding Ghana’s financial system or risk triggering economy-wide consequences.

title: Sydney police to be investigated by watchdog after anti-Herzog protest violence
desc: Videos have emerged of police appearing to punch protesters at rally against Israeli president on Monday.

title: Japan Seizes Chinese Fishing Boat; Move Likely to Add to Tensions
desc: The seizure of the trawler, which Japan said was sailing in its waters in the East China Sea, is likely to add to tensions between Tokyo and Beijing.

title: Enchanted Kingdom rolls out Valentine, Chinese New Year offerings
desc: Enchanted Kingdom rolls out Valentine’s and Chinese New Year events, concerts, fireworks and promos for the Year of the Fire Horse.

title: BTS to livestream Arirang World Tour 2026’s 3 opening nights online, with 2 concerts in cinemas
desc: BTS returns with 3 livestreamed Arirang Tour 2026 concerts in Goyang (Apr 9, 11, 12) and cinema screenings from Goyang & Tokyo. Online tickets drop Feb 27, cinema details from Feb 25.

title: New Research Insights
desc: Y chromosome loss in men linked to serious health risks.

title: US President Trump makes most aggressive step yet to roll back US climate rules
desc: US President Donald Trump revoked a key 2009 scientific finding that has been the basis for all US actions to fight climate change.
